modName: Hermaeus Mora Warlock - mage armor - DELETED
summary: Hermaeus Mora Warlock - mage armor / new looking armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/frNXVW8.png[/img]
---------------------------------------------------
[color=#999999][size=2]Dragonborn + Dawnguard dlc needed[/size][/color]
---------------------------------------------------
[b][i][size=4][color=#ffff00][u]Adds:[/u][/color]
Hermaeus Mora Warlock boots
Hermaeus Mora Warlock Robes
Hermaeus Mora Warlock Hood
Hermaeus Mora Warlock Gloves[/size][/i][/b]

[size=3]How?
Created at the Skyforge under daedric.
Uses one daedric hearth each. robes need two.
Armor for male and female (use same mesh).
Can be tempered.[/size]

[i][color=#ffff00]FAQ
Can i use it in my mod?
No, sorry.
[/color][/i]
[size=4]screens are welcome ![/size]
